data.text: @WendyWilliams Yup, Mr. Cosby sits in jail waiting appeal, while Harvey Weinstein swans about a free man.  What's the difference?  Well, Harvey's white, and gives money to a political party.  Mr. Cosby is an african american, and was foolish enough to give money to schools and colleges.

@WendyWilliams Wendy don't want Pill Cosby 2 go 2 jail?? Wha...t? That's the punishment for the 1 victim he was tried for. What abt the one's he got away with? Pill has destroyed many lives & u come out for him to have a softer cell than others? Gurl, puleeze, u missed it on this one Wendy.
@WendyWilliams Well why am I not surprised.
@WendyWilliams What is really going on with Bill Cosby.    https://t.co/8qCF0Eh6q1
@WendyWilliams I feel sad for Cosby the case was so old I cant believe they sentenced him for something he didn't do

@WendyWilliams I think you are so wrong , when it comes to Bill Cosby, and serving time. He ruined the lives of hundreds,if not thousands of souls his evil ruse.His actions have brutalized many people, including women, men, children and the universe. Please re-condider! How ya doing?
@WendyWilliams 😱💩 He should go to jail and die there. Women that are sexually assaulted have PTSD. He should be buried in the state coffin 🎬😎

@WendyWilliams Really?  The greater portion of what this guy did, we will never know.  Celebrities think they are gods. They can get away with anything. His a$% need to spend the rest of his, sorry, one foot in, and one foot out of the grave, life in jail.
@WendyWilliams Don't feel sorry for him. He's an angry old man.  He deserves everything they throw at him.
@WendyWilliams No! He should go to jail just like other rapists do! He shouldn’t get any special treatment!🤬🤬
@WendyWilliams Black celebrities are not the same as Black heroes

@WendyWilliams No Wendy as all abusers should, he goes to prison for the rest of his natural life no fancy jail just the normal hardcore one, those women have life sentences so should he. 
Now on to the next celeb/high profile abusers case!
